name: Core API Release 36.10.3
description: We have rolled out another version of the Core APIs, which brings you some new features. Please see below for details.

ADDED.text: Two APIs, namely OAuth Token By LoginRadius GUID/JWT Encrypted Token API and OIDC Token By LoginRadius GUID/JWT Encrypted Token API have been introduced in the OIDC/OAuth flow, which consumes the LoginRadius access token and, in return, provide the exchanged OIDC access token and refresh token.
New error codes 1323,1324  have been introduced with Passkey authentication APIs.

Five new APIs, namely Manage List users passkeys, Manage Remove passkey by Uid, Forgot Passkey, Login Reset passkey begin, and Login Reset Passkey Finish Passkey, have been added to enhance the functionality of the Passkey authentication user workflow.
